reviewText: Great DVD. After watching it, my child's skiing technique visibly improved. Neat stories about this legendary skier too.

The Stein way. If you watch it carefully and take it on ski trips for a review, it will help your skiing if you are intermediate or expert. Not much there for beginners. I've been skiing since 1975 and ski everywhere. This is a good video for making cruising turns like Stein used to make. RIP.
A compilation of many videos, but not a ski lesson video.  Still well worth it to watch a excellent skier demonstrate his great skill.

This is a wonderful ski movie with excellent information from an Olympic Champion skier, Stein Eriksen. The demonstrations are easy to understand and the movie makes you want to get out and ski. I recommend it to anyone who wants to improve their skiing and learn from a champion. Stein is breathtaking to watch.
Stein Eriksen on skis is not just "skiing" but poetry in motion. Terri Marie and the crew did a stellar job in capturing on video some of the unique moments of a fantastic personality.[...]
